WorkItem.Description: It seems that in the latest code (taken from source control) the Frostfire set isn't modeled at all (or rather it isn't being recognized). I had 2 Heroes pieces equipped and one Valorous, I created a shoulder item the same as the Valorous set piece and both were modeled to give the same dps although the Valorous piece should have completed the 4 set bonus. Looking at the set bonuses under buffs neither the 2 piece nor the 4 piece is shown.

Comments.Message: Make sure when you edit the item that the set bonus says "Frostfire Garb". If you're updating from armory it should be correct, but wowhead has them incorrectly tagged as 2 different sets.
Ah, yep, editing the items manually and setting the set to Frostfire Garb works, thanks.
Also, I think that's backwards; it doesn't get the set correctly from armory, and does get it correctly from wowhead, last I checked.
